attributes.action: abolish the automatic right of Archbishops and Bishops to sit in the House Of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
"A limited number of twenty-six Church of England archbishops and bishops sit in the House, passing their membership on to the next most senior bishop when they retire. The Archbishops of Canterbury and York traditionally get life peerages on retirement. "

Organised Religion must not get preferential treatment to be able to influence British Law. PLease sign this petition to enusre a fairer government for all.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
